attributes.action: grant Crudus Ignavus the ability to become an independent state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With a Constitution in place, Ministers ready for responsibilities, and an ability to reach the media already, we are seeking total independence, like Worcestershire County, from the United Kingdom. We also wish to be independent of the European Union. We are currently writing to world leaders informing them of our new nation. We will be writing to Gordon Brown also. Please feel free to search us on the internet, to find more information on our cause, and then add your signature if you feel it agrees with your opinions. We are committed to a nation that legislates on the important matters. Triumphans causa natio.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
